HomeHero.title: Palermo
HomeHero.description: Uppsala's go-to spot for pizza and good times

ContactSection.introDescription: Palermo is located at Sysslomansgatan 7, right in the center of Uppsala. Got questions about the menu, opening hours, or anything else? Send us a message here or give us a call ‚Äì we always reply as soon as we can.

ContactSection.formDescription: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactSection.privacyNote: No data is stored, neither internally nor for marketing purposes.

Form.title: Thank You for Reaching Out!
Form.description: Your message is important to us. We're reviewing your email and will get back to you as quickly as possible. Cheers! üçª

hero.title: Our Menu - Pizza, pasta & more in Uppsala
hero.description: From thin-crust "Swedish" pizzas to traditional mains ‚Ä¢ Eat in or take out

content.title: UPPSALA'S NEIGHBORHOOD RESTAURANT
content.description: Palermo has become a proper part of Uppsala. This is where students, locals and mates gather over pizza, a proper bit of meat, or just for a kanna. No fussy fine dining - just good grub and cold beer in the city centre at prices that work for everyone. Exactly what a proper local pub should be.

NotFoundPage.title: Oops! That pizza isn't on the menu
NotFoundPage.description: Either you've ordered something we don't have, or you've taken a wrong turn. Don't worry, we have plenty of other options!

lunch.title: Lunch Uppsala - Weekday Lunch at Palermo
lunch.description: Weekday lunch in Uppsala at Palermo. Choose from comfort food classics or lunch pizza, includes salad bar, bread & coffee. Served Mon-Fri 11-3. Check out our lunch menu.

hero.title: Weekday lunch at Palermo Uppsala
hero.description: From {price} SEK ‚Ä¢ Choose from {count} dishes + lunch pizza ‚Ä¢ Salad, bread & coffee included

content.title: Uppsala's most laid-back lunch
content.description: No stuffy business lunches here. Just students and locals gathering over proper comfort food and pizza downtown. Perfect for tight budgets and big appetites - which is exactly why we've kept our prices honest since day one.

FoodDelivery.title: Get Palermo delivered in Uppsala
FoodDelivery.description: Too comfy to leave home? We're on all major delivery apps. Same great food, same fair prices - delivered across Uppsala.
